--- title: Responsive embed description: Responsive embed --- ### Follow these steps to create a responsive embed - Insert the player embed code into an HTML page - Set the iframe tag's `width` and `height` attributes to `100%` inside of the embed code - Change iframe tag's CSS position parameter to `absolute` and set the left and top css parameters to `0` if needed - Add a div container around the iframe tag with the following css parameters where `padding-bottom` parameter's value is calculated from the original proportions of the embedded content (eg. 9 / 16 = 0.5625) ```html
``` ### Example import EmbedPlayer from '../../components/EmbedPlayer';
